short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will change the parents titles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Two Parent extension will allow you to change the parent's titles in any web form. For example, on some websites, the "Father" title is showing as "Parent 1" and "Mother" as "Parent 2". For some people that feel uncomfortable with that, the extension will replace the title to "Father" and "Mother" again.
